text: The Central Flying School is a flight school of the South African Air Force. It is an ab initio flight training school.History, www.af.mil.za, Retrieved 2013-10-07 The unit was formed as the central point of flying training after closure of all Air Force flying schools in South Africa. The unit operates a fleet of 55 aircraft and qualifies approximately 50 students and 20 instructors per annum. ==References== Category:Squadrons of the South African Air Force
title: Central Flying School SAAF
